title: Odd Man Out
description: MR. JULYName: Graham RawlinsQuestion: What did a man have to do to catch a woman's eye?Answer: Whatever it took.Reliable Cohort: GusGraham Rawlins had finally found the perfect apartment--and the most fascinating apartmentmate, Roberta Lambert. Caring, brainy and beautiful, she made Graham's blood sizzle... until he yearned to share more than just living quarters.But Roberta's twenty-four-hour-a-day job left no time for distractions--or Graham. Still, he was determined not to be the odd man out, and he had a foolproof plan in mind ....
author: Lass Small
